pages.text: I've moved and revised most of this category's information as well as moving the contents to BaerCraft's GitHub wiki.$(br2)There, you can find $(italic)all$() of the resources I find extremely useful or handy. Most of them improve performance, but a few are just quality of life resources.
$(l:https://github.com/antibang/BaerCraft/wiki)This will take you directly to the wiki where you can find pages related to guides, performance, and optional additional resources.
